user_data.target_needs: I wanted to fulfill the need for comfortable, stylish clothing that fits well and enhances my wardrobe.
purchase_reason: I was drawn to the soft fabric and stylish design of the top, but ultimately, the fit was disappointing as it was tighter than expected. I had hoped it would be a comfortable addition to my wardrobe, but the sizing issue led to dissatisfaction.

I was looking for comfortable and breathable clothing that would fit well, especially as a plus-size option. The brand's commitment to providing quality apparel for my size range and the positive reviews influenced my decision to purchase.
user_data.general_preference: I generally prefer clothing items that offer a comfortable fit and are true to size, as I value both style and practicality. I appreciate features like wrinkle resistance and the ability to wear items in various settings, from casual to more polished looks. Additionally, I enjoy products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. I tend to dislike items that are inaccurately sized, as this can lead to frustration, and I am not fond of overly tight or restrictive clothing. Overall, I gravitate towards versatile, well-fitting apparel that enhances my comfort and confidence.

I generally prefer clothing items that offer a comfortable fit and are true to size, as I value both style and practicality. I appreciate features like wrinkle resistance and the ability to wear items in various settings, from casual to more polished looks. Additionally, I enjoy products that are easy to care for and maintain their quality over time. I tend to dislike items that are inaccurately sized, as this can lead to frustration, and I am not fond of overly tight or restrictive clothing. Overall, I gravitate towards versatile, well-fitting apparel that enhances my comfort and confidence.

Item No.1 : Item Title: <Seek No Further by Fruit of the Loom Women's High Waisted Pleated Fit and Flare Pants> / Item ID: B0BT33W64T / Price: $17.97 Category Path: ['Clothing Shoes & Jewelry', 'Women', 'Clothing', 'Pants', 'Wear to Work'] / Description: ['Seek No Further by Fruit of the Loom provides you with must have, essential pieces for every woman’s wardrobe. This collection is designed to be a system- every piece in this collection is meant to be mixed and matched or to be paired with other staples in your closet! Contemporary fashion and effortless styles that make you feel good. Our Fit and Flare Pants are truly a must-have for any wardrobe. With a true to size fit and pockets to hold essential items these high waisted womens pants are ideal for your wardrobe. The high waist, ankle flare, and comfortable strech fabric will have you looking polished and feeling comfortable. Pair with our matching blazer for a bold look. Available in a variety of sophisticated colors. Be sure to check out all of our Seek No Further styles to find your favorites.']

Create can’t-miss pairings with long- and short-sleeve button-down shirts in standard and slim fits, plus chino pants and shorts made from wrinkle-free non-iron fabric.
